timeline.bodyText: The ObjectMapper configuration explicitly declares snake_case strategy, but there is no single standard of field naming - I see both standard java (htmlUrl) and snake case (html_url) over the project (only fields, not getters for sure). This is confusing, IMHO it should be better to standardize it (personal preference - to java).
timeline.author: seregamorph

replies.bodyText:
@seregamorph "standardize to java naming" - agreed. It just hasn't been a priority. Especially since we don't have
sufficient code coverage to have high confidence in tests ensuring it is done right.  PR welcome.
replies.author: bitwiseman

timeline.bodyText: back compatibility saved. If field is not present, the return value is still null
timeline.author: seregamorph
